short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Developer tool that allows debugging step by step the changes on websites that uses hermes-io.js in a nice/easy to use UI.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chrome extension that allows debugging step by step changes on websites that uses hermes-io.js on a nice/easy to use UI.

Features:
 - Inspect in detail sequences of events
 - Fire and debug events
 - Inspect events parameters
 - Check where a given event come from in you source code
